title: React JavaScript - Fundamentals to Coding & New Beginnings
headline: This free online web development course explains how to use Meta’s React JavaScript library to build user interfaces.
description: React is an open-source JavaScript library that you can use to build user interfaces and web applications. React is much simpler to use than JavaScript and requires significantly less coding. This web development course lays out the core principles of React. We explain how to set up your first React environment, components, keys and props. We also go through folder structure, CSS styling and React operators. Sign up to learn a valuable new skill.
courseDescription:
React is an open-source JavaScript library created by Meta. It requires less coding experience to build user interfaces and web applications than plain JavaScript (JS), but web development professionals still need a firm grasp of computer languages. The experts at Digital Partner have designed this course to equip you with the knowledge and skills you need to work with React to create interactive user interfaces for webpages and online applications.

This course includes two modules. The first introduces you to React JS and outlines its keys, components and props. We explain how to create your first React environment and modify the contents of File App.js. We also show you how to remove and render the code and work with JSX expressions, large HTML blocks, one top-level element in JavaScript XML (JSX) and ‘fragments’ used to wrap lines.

Our second module covers more complex React concepts. We demonstrate how to structure a folder in React and use CSS Styling to customise the appearance of online content. The course also covers code writing and the use of ‘Files’ to make components. We discuss the use of ‘if’ statements, React events and the role of props as parameters. We explain how to use React conditional statements, operators, lists, keys and forms. The course provides written JS codes and shows you how to visualise their results before incorporating them into your work. Sign up for this web development course to train as a React operator and learn how to use this popular, open-source JS library to create online user interfaces.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
